channel.title: Editing a server help

item.title: Editing a server help
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Check the source folder than go to data/items/unpackedShops.txt

You should see the various shops and Ids which represent them as well as the items inside of them which you can change around to your liking.

As for home, what are you trying to do? Create a new home teleport area or a whole new home area?

Read full topic

item.description:

if you have experience in coding rsps then post ur skype

thank you so much![/b][/size]
